title: New: Honne – Baby Please
body:
Oh **Honne**.

Having released one of the ‘blog-hits’ of the summer in the form of the delightfully silky [Warm On A Cold Night](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/29262-new-honne-warm-cold-night), UK duo Honne are back with the equally smooth _Baby Please_. Another post-break up anthem, it wouldn’t be out of place on Usher’s Confessions (or dare I say, backed up by a choir on Sam Smith’s recent debut), in other words, it’s brilliant. Check it out below.
